title: Give the gift of more affordable web hosting with DoRoyal, now under $40
content:

This holiday, give the gift of reliable, affordable web hosting.

Until December 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific, get a lifetime subscription to DoRoyal Website Hosting for just $39.97. No coupon is required to score this exclusive offer!
